snippet.title: BUST N RUSH :: HD PC GAMEPLAY VIDEO
snippet.description:
Bust-N-Rush is a 3D arcade runner that puts you in the shoes of Kovo, our armored juggernaut-like hero. In this score-junkie arcade throwback, Kovo embarks on an epic quest to exact vengeance against the machine monstrosity, the Satellite of Wub. Rush through three procedurally generated worlds of treacherous terrain while smashing powerful items that send you flying through the air or flip gravity's direction!

The gameplay was made from the demo version of this game.
